One longtime GOP presidential-campaign adviser supportive of Mitt Romney puts it more bluntly: Hanging around waiting for the Tea Party to find you should Mitt Romney stumble is hardly a proven nominating strategy. But being a movement conservative from the American heartland with two successful gubernatorial terms under your belt is more Reaganesque than- Reagan. Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are "very routine" for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings.------

If consumers head to the showrooms as they did in the past for the Chrysler 300, Chrysler will have an incredible year," said Jesse Toprak , an analyst with auto information company TrueCar.com. However, Chrysler still faces several obstacles on their way to better financial health, including lowering their heavy reliance on SUVs and trucks, launching a successful Fiat dealership network, and paying back the costly government loans, Jesse Toprak said. Sergio Marchionne said the company's restructuring is starting to pay off. The automaker has "lived up to its promise to launch 16 all-new or significantly refreshed vehicles in the past 12 months.
